entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light later in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
